title: Return type of yii\web\SessionIterator::current() should either be compatible with Iterator::current()
body:
### What steps will reproduce the problem?
While accessing `Yii::$app->session->iterator` get error.

### What is the expected result?
iterator return

### What do you get instead?
```
During inheritance of Iterator: Uncaught yii\base\ErrorException: Return type of yii\web\SessionIterator::current() should either be compatible with Iterator::current(): mixed, or the #[\ReturnTypeWillChange] attribute should be used to temporarily suppress the notice in /home/eurotools/public_dev/vendor/yiisoft/yii2/web/SessionIterator.php:60
Stack trace:
#0 /home/eurotools/public_dev/vendor/yiisoft/yii2/web/SessionIterator.php(16): yii\base\ErrorHandler->handleError()
#1 /home/eurotools/public_dev/vendor/yiisoft/yii2/BaseYii.php(293): include('...')
#2 /home/eurotools/public_dev/vendor/yiisoft/yii2/web/Session.php(667): yii\BaseYii::autoload()
#3 /home/eurotools/public_dev/vendor/yiisoft/yii2/base/Component.php(139): yii\web\Session->getIterator()
#4 /home/eurotools/public_dev/models/form/CheckoutForm.php(454): yii\base\Component->__get()
#5 /home/eurotools/public_dev/controllers/CheckoutController.php(53): app\models\form\CheckoutForm->process()
#6 [internal function]: app\controllers\CheckoutController->actionIndex()
#7 /home/eurotools/public_dev/vendor/yiisoft/yii2/base/InlineAction.php(57): call_user_func_array()
#8 /home/eurotools/public_dev/vendor/yiisoft/yii2/base/Controller.php(178): yii\base\InlineAction->runWithParams()
#9 /home/eurotools/public_dev/vendor/yiisoft/yii2/base/Module.php(552): yii\base\Controller->runAction()
#10 /home/eurotools/public_dev/vendor/yiisoft/yii2/web/Application.php(103): yii\base\Module->runAction()
#11 /home/eurotools/public_dev/vendor/yiisoft/yii2/base/Application.php(384): yii\web\Application->handleRequest()
#12 /home/eurotools/public_dev/web/index.php(43): yii\base\Application->run()
#13 {main}
```

### Additional info

| Q                | A
| ---------------- | ---
| Yii version      | 2.0.45
| PHP version      | 8.1
| Operating system |Linux
